segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5
22. Akkosakavagga
213. Sīlasutta
“Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks for an unethical person because of their failure in ethics.

segments.pli: Katame pañca?
Idha, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
segments.en: Firstly, an unethical person loses substantial wealth on account of negligence.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
segments.en: Furthermore, an unethical person gets a bad reputation.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—avisārado upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto.
segments.en: Furthermore, an unethical person enters any kind of assembly timid and embarrassed, whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
segments.en: Furthermore, an unethical person dies feeling lost.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: Furthermore, an unethical person, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks for an unethical person because of their failure in ethics.

segments.pli: Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
segments.en: There are these five benefits for an ethical person because of their accomplishment in ethics.

segments.pli: Katame pañca?
Idha, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
segments.en: Firstly, an ethical person gains substantial wealth on account of diligence.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
segments.en: Furthermore, an ethical person gets a good reputation.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto.
segments.en: Furthermore, an ethical person enters any kind of assembly bold and self-assured, whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ bhikkhave, tatiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
segments.en: Furthermore, an ethical person dies not feeling lost.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: Furthermore, when an ethical person’s body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
segments.en: These are the five benefits for an ethical person because of their accomplishment in ethics.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.
